articles.title: COVID Vaccination Choices Split Families And Communities In Rural Montana : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: In sprawling Flathead County, only 25% of adults are fully vaccinated against COVID-19. Public health experts worry about reservoirs of potential outbreaks as neighbors still debate the virus' danger.

U.S. Treasury yields rose on Tuesday as investors continued to pore over any signs of rising inflation.
